short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 浏览器标签管理工具，对标OneTab
short.en: Browser Tab Management Tool: Comparable to OneTab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Introducing N-Tab: Your Ultimate Browser Tab Manager

N-Tab: 您的终极浏览器标签管理器

Organize, Sync, and Restore Your Tabs with Ease

轻松整理、同步和恢复您的标签

Are you tired of losing track of your open tabs? Do you struggle to switch between devices and maintain a seamless browsing experience? Look no further! N-Tab is here to revolutionize how you manage your browser tabs.

您是否厌倦了迷失在众多打开的标签中？在不同设备间切换时，是否感到困扰，无法保持流畅的浏览体验？那么请不要再寻找了！N-Tab将彻底改变您管理浏览器标签的方式。

Effortlessly Store and Sync Your Tabs
N-Tab provides a powerful solution to store and sync your tabs across multiple devices. Whether you prefer automatic real-time synchronization or manual syncing, our plugin ensures that your tab data is always up to date and accessible whenever and wherever you need it.

轻松存储和同步您的标签
N-Tab为您提供了一个强大的解决方案，可将您的标签数据存储并同步到多个设备上。无论您偏好自动实时同步还是手动同步，我们的插件都能确保您的标签数据始终保持最新，并且随时随地都可以访问。

Keep a Detailed History of Synced Tabs
With N-Tab, synchronization is not just about the latest data. We believe in preserving your browsing journey. Our plugin keeps a detailed record of your synchronized tabs, allowing you to easily revisit and restore your browsing sessions, just like stepping back into the "crime scene" of your internet exploration.

保留详细的同步标签历史记录
在N-Tab中，同步不仅仅是关于最新数据。我们注重保存您的浏览历程。我们的插件会详细记录您同步的标签，让您可以轻松重访和恢复您的浏览会话，就像回到您互联网探索的“案发现场”一样。

Import and Export Data with Ease
N-Tab goes beyond standard tab management. You can effortlessly import and export your tab data, making it a breeze to switch between different browsers or share your tab collections with friends and colleagues. Plus, we've got you covered if you're currently using OneTab – easily import your existing OneTab data into N-Tab for a seamless transition.

轻松导入和导出数据
N-Tab不仅仅是标准的标签管理工具。您可以轻松地导入和导出标签数据，方便在不同的浏览器之间切换或与朋友和同事分享您的标签收藏。此外，如果您目前正在使用OneTab，我们也为您提供了完美的解决方案 - 轻松将现有的OneTab数据导入到N-Tab中，实现无缝过渡。

Seamless Multi-Platform Experience
Whether you're jumping between your desktop, laptop, or mobile devices, N-Tab ensures a seamless multi-platform experience. Your tabs are always in sync, ready to be accessed with a click, no matter which device you're using. Say goodbye to the hassle of manually recreating your browsing sessions across different devices.

无缝跨平台体验
无论您在台式机、笔记本电脑还是移动设备之间切换，N-Tab都能确保您享受无缝的跨平台体验。您的标签始终保持同步，只需轻轻一点，就可以访问这些标签，无论您使用哪种设备。告别手动在不同设备上重新创建浏览会话的麻烦。

Enhance Your Browsing with Quick Translations
We've added a handy feature to make your browsing even more convenient. N-Tab allows you to translate selected text instantly with a simple mouse click. Say goodbye to copy-pasting and switching between tabs – now you can get quick translations right at your fingertips.

通过快速翻译Enhance Your Browsing with Quick Translations
我们增加了一个方便的功能，使您的浏览更加方便。N-Tab允许您通过简单的鼠标点击即可即时翻译所选文本。告别复制粘贴和在标签之间切换的麻烦 - 现在您可以轻松获得快速翻译。

Experience the Power of N-Tab Today!
Don't let your browser tabs overwhelm you. Take control of your browsing experience with N-Tab. Download our plugin now and unlock a whole new level of tab management and synchronization.

今天就体验N-Tab的强大功能吧！不要让您的浏览器标签变得无法管理。使用N-Tab，掌控您的浏览体验。立即下载我们的插件，开启全新的标签管理和同步体验。

Last but not least, we sincerely appreciate your support and use of N-Tab. As a freelancer, every penny of income is crucial to us. If you enjoy our plugin and would like to see it grow and improve, we kindly ask you to consider making a donation to support our work. Your generous contribution will help us continue providing high-quality products and services, while also serving as an encouragement and recognition for our team.

最后，我们非常感谢您的支持和使用 N-Tab。作为一个自由职业者，每一分收入对我们来说都非常重要。如果您喜欢我们的插件并希望继续看到它的发展和改进，我们真诚地请求您考虑捐赠支持我们的工作。您的慷慨捐赠将有助于我们继续提供高质量的产品和服务，同时也是对我们团队的鼓励和认可。

Thank you once again for your support! We greatly value your presence as our user and will continue striving to provide the best products and experiences.

再次感谢您的支持！我们非常珍惜您作为我们用户的存在，并将继续努力提供最好的产品和体验。
long.en:
这是一个管理浏览器标签的工具，对标OneTab，自用了4年，没有丢失过数据。使用起来非常简单，完全依赖直觉就可以轻松上手。
如果对您有帮助或者提高您的效率的话，不管是工作上还是生活上，麻烦投喂一下，目前自由职业状态，每一分收入都很重要，谢谢！
